desc: A family owned business providing custom hand forged damascus steel knives. We use the most premium materials for our chef knives, hunting knives, and knife sets. Hand-forged damascus custom knives Damascus steel knives Handmade blades kukri bowie santoku vegetable dagger axe

layout.text: A family-owned business creating professional grade damascus knives for those with a passion for the art of metalworking.
